short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents BigStock from starting a search while typing in the search bar. Also prevents image previews from opening while hovering.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances your searching experience on BigStock by removing image popups while scrolling and disabling automatically searching when typing in the search bar.
